commenter_a: When I was young and in school we had the D.A.R.E program, trying to educate youth about drugs and help us make good decisions not to do them. We need a program now to educate our children on sexual predators, how to watch out for them, to be aware of how they manipulate, etc and where they can call for help and a safe harbor. I would happily volunteer to speak at any school. We need to protect these children and let them know they are not alone and that where someone may have failed them, we will not.
